headline.main: RED CROSS UNITS AID AUTO VICTIMS; British-American Ambulance Trek in Westchester Comes Upon Valhalla Accident

lead_paragraph: VALHALLA, N.Y., Nov. 15 -- Volunteer chauffeurs of the Westchester unit of the American Red Cross, driving ambulances in a British-American Ambulance Corps county-wide trek, obtained first hand experience early tonight when they were called upon to administer first aid to two men injured in an automobile crash here on Columbus Avenue.
abstract: ambulance corps drivers of Red Cross chap practice 1st aid, Valhalla, N Y; illus
